post.author: Ihn-Sok
post.content:
Host Technical Leads



Perform high level analysis and translate into detailed design specifications, assess impact on other applications, review code, consult and provide direction for analysts and developers.



Qualifications:

   Ability to perform DB2 database analysis

   Minimum of five years COBOL development experience

   Strong experience with IMS, MQSeries JCL, DB2, IMS/DC, TSO, MVS

   Experience working on large scale, multi-component highly complex projects

   Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written

   Experience working with Business Groups on solutions analysis/design

   Ability to lead and mentor team members



Host Analysts/Developers



Responsibilities include: analysis, design, estimating, development, testing, documentation, and implementation management on a large development project for a financial institution.



Qualifications:

   Minimum of five years COBOL development experience

   Strong experience with IMS, MQSeries JCL, DB2, IMS/DC, TSO, MVS

   Experience with SAS an asset

   Experience with Software Development methodology

   Financial Institution is preferred

   Solid verbal and written communication skills
post.title: Host Technical Leads and Developers
